name: Monsters Road
description:
Details: Monsters Road is a horror, point and click video game inspired by the FNAF series and developed by CFFS! It is the first game of the series proposed for development. The game is designed specifically for PC and runs on any operating system (Windows XP - Windows 10).

Story: The action takes place in 2007 in Bucharest, and the main character (you) is Tommy Griffin, a reporter sent to investigate a hotel during the night because the hotel staff complained that at night there were terrible sounds like pauses, screams and evil laughter ! In the first hotel investigation, Tommy does not find anything strange ... He just hears a few sounds but does not matter. But from the second investigation, things begin to complicate because monsters are starting to make their appearance! Every night he is called by the hotel manager who gives advice.
In the second investigation, in the hallway, around the 3rd, there is a voice in the lobby that tells Tommy that he is stuck in the hotel and can only leave if 10 investigations survive, but even if he succeeds, the monsters will stay in mind and he will always haunt him wherever he goes!

Thanks: This game was developed over a four-month period and worked with one person. The developer of this game is called Costin and lives in Romania, and for this reason it is possible that there are some minor grammatical mistakes!
